  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:51c58b00-d706-4e10-9a64-199a5298a5aa</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>51c58b00-d706-4e10-9a64-199a5298a5aa</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A GSMT (Giant Segmented Mirror Telescope)</string>
            <string language="en-US">The GSMT (Giant Segmented Mirror Telescope)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das GSMT (Riesiges Segmentiertes 
Spiegel-Teleskop)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le GSMT (Télescope Segmenté Géant de Miroir)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O GSMT (Telescópio Segmentado Gigante Do 
Espelho)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il GSMT (Telescopio Segmentato Gigante Dello 
Specchio)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το GSMT (τετμημένο γίγαντας τηλεσκόπιο καθρεφτών)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El GSMT (Telescopio Dividido En segmentos Gigante
Del Espejo)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A GSMT (Giant Segmented Mirror Telescope) 30 m-es távcső tükre 618 szabályos hatszögletű elemből áll majd</string>
            <string language="en-US">The mirror of the 30-meter GSMT (Giant Segmented Mirror Telescope) will consist of 618 regular hexagonal-shaped pieces</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">távcső</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászati távcső</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">GSMT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lencsés távcső</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Spiegel des 30-meter GSMT (riesiges 
segmentiertes Spiegel-Teleskop) besteht aus 618 regelmäßigen 
sechseckig-geformten Stücken</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le miroir du 30-meter GSMT (télescope segmenté 
géant de miroir) se composera de 618 morceaux hexagonal-formés 
réguliers</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O espelho do 30-meter GSMT (telescópio 
segmentado gigante do espelho) consistirá em 618 partes 
sextavado-dadas forma regulares</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo specchio del 30-meter GSMT (telescopio 
segmentato gigante dello specchio) consisterà di 618 esagonale-a 
forma di parti normali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο καθρέφτης του 30-μετρητή GSMT (ο γίγαντας έτεμνε 
το τηλεσκόπιο καθρεφτών) θα αποτελεσθεί από 618 κανονικά 
εξαγωνικός-διαμορφωμένα κομμάτια</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El espejo del 30-meter GSMT (telescopio dividido 
en segmentos gigante del espejo) consistirá en 618 pedazos 
hexagonal-formados regulares</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστρονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en-US">It may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
